Summary: it was unlike anything ive ever witnessed
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Cumming
There were no other sightings in Cumming on or around June 20th 2009
divs: Sighting Details I was just walking my dog out side and as always i like to look up at the stars. well this time when i looked up it looked as if there was a star falling to earth and i was about to call my husband donny but there wasnt enough time. because at that exact moment what seemed to appear as a falling star actually turned out to be what seemed to be a ship of some kind. so i just stood there and watched in amazment at the sight before me. and like i said it was unlike anything i had ever witnessed. it was trully amazing.it was kind of hard to tell what it looked like but it was bigger at the bottom and got skinnier at the top. the bottom also kind of spunaroundin a counter clock wise motion and had like two lights on opposite sides that seemed to wink at you. then just as i was about to go in to get the camera the ship seemed to hover for another second or two and then it just lifted up in to the sky and flew off. just like that it was gone.
